channel.title: IP blocking
channel.description:
How do I block an IP from connecting to my VPS, so it will stop this;
[code]ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2127 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2214 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2223 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2315 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2400 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2410 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2496 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2504 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2514 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2608 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2694 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2704 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2711 They are in ip ban list! ClientHandler: Rejected host86-143-237-80.range86-143.btcentralplus.com:2721[/code]
Thanks,
- RuneX -

item.title: IP blocking
item.dc:creator: @Zerosoft Zerosoft
item.description:
@Zerosoft wrote:

im not sure you can, look in the client.java files, see if anything in there will help you. and remember the most stupid saying of all time, google is your friend.
